.. _singularity_sif_setprim:

singularity sif setprim
-----------------------

Set primary system partition

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Set primary system partition

::

  singularity sif setprim <descriptorid> <containerfile> [flags]

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for setprim

~~~~~~~~
